[00:08.96]You gotta go and get angry at all of my honesty

[00:13.54]You know I try but I don't do too well with apologies

[00:17.61]I hope I don't run out of time could someone call a referee

[00:21.78]Cause I just need one more shot at forgiveness

[00:27.12]I know you know that I made those mistakes maybe once or twice

[00:31.44]By once or twice I mean maybe a couple a hundred times

[00:35.50]So let me oh let me redeem oh redeem oh myself tonight

[00:39.99]Cause I just need one more shot at second chances

[00:44.87]Oh is it too late now to say sorry

[00:49.53]Cause I'm missing more than just your body

[00:54.10]Is it too late now to say sorry

[00:58.51]Yeah I know that I let you down
